title: Sally Kellerman, the original 'Hot Lips' Houlihan from 'M*A*S*H' movie, dies at 84
description: Sally Kellerman, who starred in Robert Altman's "M*A*S*H" film and in an early episode of "Star Trek," has died. She was 84.
content: Sally Kellerman, the original Magaret "Hot Lips" Houlihan in the 1970 Robert Altman film "M*A*S*H*," died Thursday from heart failure, her manager and publicist Alan Eichlerconfirmed to USA TODAY. Sh… [+2345 chars]
